version_description:
1.7.1 fixes a bug that prevented some users from viewing their items. Thanks so much to everyone who reported it!

WHAT’S NEW

SUBSCRIPTIONS
Now there's a new way to support Habitica: the iOS app now offers subscriptions! Subscribers help us keep the app running and updating, so as a thank-you, they get exclusive monthly items, the ability to buy gems with gold, and more. If you like our app, give it a peek. If you're already a subscriber, you can now use the app to open your monthly gift and buy gems with gold! Tap the gem icon or check out “Gems & Subscription” through the menu to learn more.

IMPROVEMENTS
Task lists have been redesigned and there are new icons for the header!

BUG FIXES
The issue where special pets could not be fed through the app has been corrected, and other minor bugs were fixed as well. Be sure to download now for increased stability! We hope you enjoy the update!

WHAT'S NEW

CHALLENGES

Now iOS users can view, join, and leave Challenges via the app! Easily add user-created tasks to your list, then compete against other Habiticans to win gems and achievements.

BUG FIXES

The issue where Dailies would not always be saved on iOS 8 and 9 has been corrected, and other minor bugs were fixed as well. Be sure to download now for increased stability! We hope you enjoy the update!

WHAT'S NEW

BUG FIXES

The issue where Dailies would not always be saved on iOS 8 and 9 has been corrected, and a fix has been implemented for the crashes some users were experiencing when using To-Dos and checklists

REPEATABLE DAILIES

We've also added Repeatable Dailies, one of the most-requested new features! Set a Daily to be due monthly, yearly, or at another interval you choose.

CHALLENGES

Now iOS users can view, join, and leave Challenges via the app! Easily add user-created tasks to your list, then compete against other Habiticans to win gems and achievements.

Be sure to download now for increased stability! We hope you enjoy the update!

In this update, we've smashed some bugs! There's also a new, exciting feature which will be unveiled soon.

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap. We hope you enjoy the update!

In this update, we've added an exciting new introduction and a fancy new login screen featuring a lovely nighttime Habitica landscape. There's also an improved tutorial to help new Habiticans get started with slaying their tasks! And last but not least, we've made Habitica prettier by updating some of our design elements.

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

In this update, we've fixed two pesky bugs! First, we've added a fix for the bug that caused users to be logged out of the app frequently. We've also fixed the issue where blank spaces appeared in the spots for your non-Due Dailies.

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

We've released a new iOS update! In this update, we've added improved VoiceOver support for better accessibility! We welcome feedback on this feature through the in-app Send Feedback option. We've also updated the design of the Shops and your Rewards column. There's yet another sensational new feature coming very soon! We hope this makes upgrading your avatar and earning Rewards from your tasks even more motivating.

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

We've released a new iOS update! In this update, we've added improved VoiceOver support for better accessibility! We welcome feedback on this feature through the in-app Send Feedback option. We've also updated the design of the Shops and your Rewards column, and added the ability to pin items from shops into your Rewards column! We hope this makes upgrading your avatar and earning Rewards from your tasks even more motivating.

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

We've released a new iOS update! In this update, we've added new features including the ability to allocate stat points, fix character values, and make account changes from within the app. We've also smashed a number of pesky bugs, including the issues with inbox messaging, crashes when opening subscriber gear, and even the notorious task-ordering bug!

We hope you enjoy the update. Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

2.2.0 Introduces the ability to gift a subscription to a friend! It also fixes a bug where Animal Ears were not purchasable for the correct amount of gems, tags weren’t able to be deleted, and swiping to delete tasks should work as normal again.

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

1.13.1 fixes an issue where reminders for tasks would not show correctly

1.13:
We've released a new iOS update! Exciting events are afoot in Habitica, and in this update we've prepared your app for the upcoming adventure! There are also some aesthetic updates to the Tavern and Menu, a new view for Challenge participant progress, and Settings has been moved to a gear-shaped icon in the header of the Menu page for easier access. There are also several bugfixes included.

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

In this update, we've added new features including the ability to purchase equipment from the Market, performance fixes for chat, and accessibility improvements. We've also smashed a number of pesky bugs, including problems some users experienced with notifications, chat, and Challenges!

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience.

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

In this update, we've upgraded lots of pages including Tasks, Equipment, Guilds, and Parties. We’ve also added sound effects, hooray! You can now also delete your account from within the app. We also smashed a number of pesky bugs, including display issues with Parties, Items, and backgrounds, some bugs with To-Do due dates and more!

We hope you enjoy the update! Be sure to download it now for a better Habitica experience!

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out! Old reviews get hidden with each update, but if you go to the review section you can re-post them again with a single tap.

If you like the improvements that we’ve been making to our app, please consider reviewing this new version. It really helps us out!

This update includes fixes to our VoiceOver compatibility, makes sure notifications only send once, cleans up some lingering UI issues while in dark mode, along with various other bug fixes.
We’ve also updated the price of the Dustbunny and Basi-list Quests to better reflect their value.
Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

This update introduces Apple sign in support! If you use a social login method, you can now add an additional email and password login through Settings.

Quests also got a few updates. You’ll now be notified when a quest is completed and shown the rewards you received. Along with that, you can preview quest rewards and requirements before inviting your Party.

Messages received an update as well, allowing you to start a new private message through username search.

Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

In 2.8.1 we fixed an issue related to task editing.

With 2.8.2 we fixed an issue related to the quest completion modal

2.8: This update introduces Apple sign in support! If you use a social login method, you can now add an additional email and password login through Settings.

Quests also got a few updates. You’ll now be notified when a quest is completed and shown the rewards you received. Along with that, you can preview quest rewards and requirements before inviting your Party.

Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

2.9: This update adds a few new features including the ability to purchase subscriber gems in bulk from the Market and the ability to gift gems to other users via Menu > Purchase Gems. We also refreshed some aspects of our UI and made other fixes and improvements.

We hope you enjoy these additions. Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

This update includes the ability to bulk buy eggs and hatching potions from the Market, and you’ll be warned if you try to buy more than needed to complete the relevant set of pets/mounts. We also refreshed the task screen design and made other miscellaneous improvements.
We hope you enjoy these additions. Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

We fixed an issue that would leave some users not being able to see their items.
This update includes the ability to bulk buy eggs and hatching potions from the Market, and you’ll be warned if you try to buy more than needed to complete the relevant set of pets/mounts. We also refreshed the task screen design and made other miscellaneous improvements.
We hope you enjoy these additions. Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

This update includes a pretty big visual overhaul! We refreshed the task list design to make it more sleek and reduce visual clutter. We hope you like it!
As usual, we’ve also included some other updates to improve your Habitica experience. You can now delete Challenge tasks you no longer want right from your task list and see the title of the Challenge they belong to from the task edit screen. Before you delete, we’ll tell you how many tasks are a part of the Challenge and allow you to delete them all at once!
Along with that, there’s a whole new Support section that includes helpful tips, known issues, and common bug fixes that should help even the most seasoned adventurer. Finally, we now allow you to use transformation buff items from the Special section of Items so even players below level 10 can have fun transforming their party members.
Be sure to download this update now for a better Habitica experience!

This update makes hatching pets easier than ever! Now you’re able to see when a pet is hatchable, then hatch it right from the Pets screen. You can also tap any pet you don’t currently own and see what items are needed to hatch it.
We’ve also introduced the Fortify Potion! If your tasks are getting out of hand and you’re overwhelmed with red, just use a Fortify Potion and it will reset them all to a neutral value. Fortify Potions can be bought in the Market.
Finally, we’ve included a few fixes to the colors in dark mode as well as squashing various pesky bugs to make your Habitica experience better than ever.

We added some widgets to habitica!

We’ve added the ability to select different default launch screens! Do you mainly use Dailies or find yourself constantly checking off To Do’s? Now you can set the app to automatically launch to either of those screens, and more! Go to Settings to explore the various launch screen options. We’ve also refreshed the Discover Guilds section to help you find the perfect Guild for your interests. Hope you enjoy this newest Habitica update!

Now you can set the app to automatically launch to either of those screens, and more! Go to Settings to explore the various launch screen options. We’ve also refreshed the Discover Guilds section to help you find the perfect Guild for your interests. Hope you enjoy this newest Habitica update!

We’ve added a countdown to all limited time items! No more guessing when our seasonal Galas may end. Now you can see exactly how much longer you have to get everything you want before time’s up. We hope you enjoy!
